actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey a parcel of land located at Fort A.P. Hill, Virginia, to the Northern Virginia Regional Correctional Commission for the purpose of constructing a correctional facility on such land.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Northern Virginia Regional Correctional Commission a parcel of real property at Fort A.P. Hill, Virginia. Requires: (1) construction of a correctional facility on such property to be completed within three years after enactment of this Act; and (2) the Commission to use such land only for operating a correctional facility, with a reverter to the United States if used otherwise.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey a parcel of land located at Fort A.P. Hill, Virginia, to the Northern Virginia Regional Correctional Commission for the purpose of constructing a correctional facility on such land.
